description: This file contains CSS styles for a React application, including CSS variables for theme management and styling for various components like App, App-header, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main class for styling the application layout and background color based on the selected theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the app, including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the app, affecting color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button that toggles the theme, including positioning and animation effects.
